fields.name: answer
fields.description: This member's answer to the event RSVP question

fields.name: guestsCount
fields.description: The number of guests the member has for this event

fields.name: isFirstEvent
fields.description: Indicator that this RSVP is the first RSVP for member associated with the RSVP

fields.name: isHost
fields.description: Indicator that the member associated with this RSVP is a host for this event

fields.name: membership
fields.description: Membership associated with the RSVP. This may be absent for former members

fields.name: payStatus
fields.description:
The current event payment status for the RSVP for ticketed events from the perspective of the provided memberId.
A payment status is only available if the RSVP belongs to the calling member or if
the calling member has permission to manage money within the hosting group.

fields.name: updated
fields.description: time this RSVP was last updated

fields.name: venue
fields.description: May be null for physical (in-person) events
